mapper.select: select u.id, u.account, u.group_id, t.name, t.id_card, t.email, t.phone, t.create_time, t.belonging_type, t.status, t.percent_off, t.account_balance from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.type=4 order by t.name

select u.id, u.account, u.group_id, t.name, t.id_card, t.email, t.phone, t.create_time, t.belonging_type, t.status, t.account_balance from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id join agent a on a.id=t.belonging_id where u.type=4 and a.id=#{agentId} order by t.name

select u.id, u.account, u.group_id, t.name, t.id_card, t.email, t.phone, t.percent_off, t.account_balance from sys_user u join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.id = #{id}

select t.id, u.account, t.name, u.password, t.id_card, t.email, t.email_verified, t.phone, t.phone_verified, t.create_time, t.status status from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.type = 4 and u.account = #{account} limit 1

select t.id, u.account, t.name, u.password, t.id_card, t.email, t.email_verified, t.phone, t.phone_verified, t.create_time, t.status status from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.type = 4 and t.name = #{name} limit 1

select t.id, t.id_card, t.email, t.email_verified, t.phone, t.phone_verified, t.create_time, t.status status from terminal_user t where t.email = #{email} limit 1

select u.id id, u.account account, t.name name, t.email email, t.phone phone, t.create_time createTime, t.status status from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.type = 4 and binary u.account = #{account}
select u.id id, u.account account, t.name name, t.email email, t.status status from sys_user u left join terminal_user t on u.id = t.id where u.type = 4 and binary t.id_card = #{idCard} limit 1
